reviews.review: One of my favourite movies. My friends and I have seen it twice today and we just absolutely love it. It has great acting and story. Strong character development and am amazing ending. I went to this movie thinking nothing but just trash but when I left I couldn't believe how great it was. I was in the edge of my seat wondering what would happen next! The best way to spend your 86 minutes.

Bad doesn't even begin to describe this movie. It is insufferable from beginning to end. The Emoji Movie will try in vain to keep your attention with jokes that fly a mile a minute, and colorful images, but you would be better off using your smartphone for 86 minutes rather than watching one of the worst animated films ever made.
The emoji movie was a beautiful work of art from Sony Animation
This movie is quite possibly the greatest, most revolutionary piece of artistry in human history, possibly the history of the universe. Please. Please. See this film. Please.
truly one of the most incredible movies i have ever seen
10/10 would shoot up a school again after watching this
From what i saw it was amazing, but jacksfilms forehead covered most of the screen

The Emoji Movie gives us something that no one wanted to see be adapted into a full-length film and still happened anyways just to make money. This movie was just a full on advertisement of the different apps that was shown and also throwing in some cringeworthy jokes that just didn't even work at all. Sony just don't even know what they're even doing anymore since they couldn't make this movie work at all and they seem to rip off elements from other (better) animated movies from the past such as Wreck-it-Ralph, Inside Out, and The Lego Movie. Overall, this movie was really unnecessary, the comedy didn't work, the plot was super predictable, and it lacks creativity. The only good thing I can say about this movie is the animation but it still doesn't save this terrible movie, so I suggest to not waste your money on this. It also still upsets me that the studio made this over a Popeye movie.
